title: Torvill and Dean: path to perfection
brief_description: Chronicles the rise of world ice-skating champions Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean. Shows eight dance routines from the World Championships in 1980, 1982 and 1983, the European championships from Budapest and the Williams and Glynn Gala in 1982.
